whatIsApp.heading: What is SeaNeB App?
whatIsApp.subheading: Get the Best Local Offers & Deals in One Simple Place
paragraphs: SeaNeB App is a location-based local business/shop discovery app designed to connect local business owners with customers in their own locality. Whether you're a shopkeeper, a restaurant owner, or a service provider, SeaNeB App helps you post your deals, discounts, and promotions in real-time ‚Äî and reach customers right where they are.
For customers, it's a one-stop solution to find trending offers nearby, explore new shops, and save money while supporting the local economy.

items.title: Simplifies Offer Discovery & Management
items.body: The app provides a simple, clean user interface ‚Äî allowing customers to find and use offers quickly, and businesses to manage them without needing tech skills or external support. From uploading images to setting offer terms and expiries, the process is built for speed and control.
points: 70% of small businesses avoid digital platforms due to complexity
Frictionless tools reduce business onboarding time and improve user retention

items.title: Empowers Smart Buying Decisions for Local Consumer
items.body: Customers want to stretch their spending without sacrificing quality. SeaNeB Offers helps users discover relevant discounts across food, services, retail, and more‚Äîorganized by category, proximity, and expiry date.
points: 76% of consumers say personalized offers influence their purchase decisions
2 out of 3 customers actively look for deals before visiting a store or booking a service

items.title: Increases Local Business Visibility Without Ad Spend
items.body: Businesses can publish and promote their deals without the complexity or cost of running digital ads. The app surfaces their offers organically to users browsing locally, meaning zero advertising cost but continuous exposure.

items.title: Bridges the Gap Between Businesses and Customers
items.body: The SeaNeB Offers App connects verified local businesses directly with nearby customers looking for relevant, time-sensitive offers. Unlike mass-market deal apps, SeaNeB Offers emphasizes hyperlocal engagement, helping small businesses promote to real people in their vicinity.
points: 93% of consumers say they prefer supporting local businesses when possible
88% of mobile searches for local intent result in either a call or visit within 24 hours

items.title: Boosts Local Commerce Through Real-Time Offer
items.body: For both seasonal campaigns and last-minute deals, SeaNeB lets businesses instantly reach their audience. Customers receive real-time notifications about new offers in their location or category of interest, creating timely action.
points: Push notifications have an average open rate of 90%
Time-sensitive alerts increase offer redemption likelihood by 45%

items.title: Builds Trust With Verified Listings
items.body: All businesses and offers go through a basic verification process, making customers more confident in engaging. Each listing shows details like business location, T&Cs, duration, and usage limits‚Äîreducing ambiguity and increasing conversions.
points: Verified listings increase user trust and conversion by 30% or more
Clear offer conditions reduce cart abandonment or drop-offs

faq.heading: Frequently asked questions
faq.subheading: Here are some common questions about our company.

items.question: Is the SeaNeB App free?
items.answer: Yes, it's 100% free to use. No subscription or hidden fees.

items.question: Are the deals updated regularly?
items.answer: Yes. We work with partners to update and verify deals every week.

items.question: Can I use it without creating an account?
items.answer: Unfortunately, you need to login with your mobile number. Don't worry, we don't save any of your data.
